devotional.title: Daily Devotional
devotional.verseText: Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you. I do not give to you as the world gives. Do not let your hearts be troubled and do not be afraid.
devotional.reflectionContent: In a world filled with uncertainty and chaos, Jesus offers us something the world cannot provide‚ÄîHis peace. This isn't a temporary calm that fades when circumstances change; it's a deep, abiding peace that transcends understanding. Today, you may be facing challenges that seem overwhelming. Jesus speaks directly to these struggles: "Do not let your hearts be troubled." This is both a comfort and a command. We are invited to actively choose peace by placing our trust in the One who has overcome the world.
devotional.prayerContent: Lord Jesus, thank You for the gift of Your peace‚Äîa peace that the world cannot give and cannot take away. Today, I choose to release my anxieties and fears into Your capable hands. Help me to trust You fully, knowing that You are working all things together for my good. Fill my heart with Your presence and let Your peace guard my mind. Amen.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Learn how ScriptureForge AI collects, uses, and protects your personal information.
privacy.intro: Welcome to ScriptureForge AI ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our AI-powered Bible study application.
privacy.section2_1Text: When you create an account, we may collect:
section2_1Items: Profile information you choose to provide
privacy.section2_2Text: We automatically collect certain information when you use our service:
section2_2Items: Chat conversations with our AI assistant
IP address and general location data
privacy.section3Text: We use the information we collect to:
section3Items: Provide and personalize our Bible study services
Save your reading progress and preferences
Improve our AI models and service quality
Send important service updates and notifications
privacy.section4Text: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your data with:
section4Items: Service Providers: Third-party services that help us operate (hosting, analytics, AI processing)
AI Partners: Your chat queries may be processed by AI providers (OpenAI, Anthropic) to generate responses
Legal Requirements: When required by law or to protect our rights
privacy.section5Text: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information, including encryption in transit and at rest, secure authentication, and regular security audits. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacy.section6Text: Depending on your location, you may have the right to:
section6Items: Access and receive a copy of your personal data
Delete your account and associated data
Object to or restrict certain processing
privacy.section7Text: ScriptureForge AI is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.
privacy.section8Text: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.
privacy.section9Text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically.
privacy.section10Text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:

faqs.question: Is ScriptureForge AI free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes! ScriptureForge AI is completely free to use with all features available to everyone.

faqs.question: Which Bible translations are available?
faqs.answer: We offer multiple translations including KJV, NIV, ESV, NASB, and many more. You can switch between translations at any time.

faqs.question: How accurate are the AI responses?
faqs.answer: Our AI is trained on biblical scholarship and aims to provide helpful insights. However, we always recommend verifying important interpretations with trusted sources and spiritual leaders.

faqs.question: Can I use ScriptureForge AI offline?
faqs.answer: Yes! You can download Bible translations for offline reading. Some AI features require an internet connection.

faqs.question: How do I report an issue?
faqs.answer: You can report issues through our Contact Support page or email us at support@scriptureforge.ai.

faqs.question: Is my data private and secure?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We use industry-standard encryption and never sell your personal data. See our Privacy Policy for details.
